content.rendered:
Directed by Andrew Renzi. Andrew Renzi.

Cast Todd Hoffman( Self – The Investor). Michael Patti( Self – Former Creative Director – Pepsi’s Ad Agency). Jeff Mordos( Self – The Wolf) . Brian Swette( Self – Former Chief Marketing Officer – Pepsi). Linda Leonard( Self – John’s Mom). Michael Davis( John Leonard). Jason Fielders( Todd Hoffman). Michael Avenatti( Self – The Spin Doctor). Larry Schantz( Self – The Kid’s Lawyer). Curtis Lee Newton( Pepsi Lawyer). Cindy Crawford( Self – The Icon). Phyllis Hoffman( Self – Todd’s Mom). Tom Wade( Pepsi Lawyer). Christopher Manning( Michael Avenatti). Jack Cutler( Pepsi Lawyer). Gloria Laisure( Pepsi Lawyer). Philip Beley( Self – Coca-Cola Ad Executive). Henry Omaga-Diaz( Self – Journalist). Cindy Datul( Self – Philippine Resident). Jowell Roque( Self – Philippine Resident). Manny Pacquiao( Self – World Champion Boxer). Jenna Dolan( Self – Call Sign ‘Dookie’). Jenna Dolan( Self – Call Sign ‘Dookie’). Arsenio Maravillo( Self – Philippine Resident). Marily So( Self – Philippine Resident). Jay Manheimer( Self – Avenatti’s BFF). David Nachman( Self – The Kid’s Litigator). Brianne Buishas( Student). Steven Tulumello( Process Server). Randall Newkirk( FBI Agent)

Language English.

Producers Brandon Bennett. Nick Boak. Andrew Corkin. Andrew Fried. Theo James. Dane Lillegard. Jeremiah Murphy. Lauren Ospala. Andrew Renzi. Vivian Johnson Rogowski. Sarina Roma. Jordan Wynn.

Production Boardwalk Pictures.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 4

Status Finished (2022–2022)
